availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Shivell (Henry County and McCracken County, Kentucky, druggist.)

body.p: Henry County and McCracken County, Kentucky, druggist. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Ann Holland in Henry County, Kentucky, on November 15, 1858. Father of James D. Shivell. Attended the Eclectic Medical Institute in in Cincinnati, Hamilton County, Ohio, in 1855. Druggist in McCracken County, Kentucky, in 1860. Postmaster in McCracken County from October 20, 1864 to July 10, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, District 2, p. 859.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Woodville, p. 91B.
Annual Announcement of the Ecletic Medical Institute, of Cincinnati, for the Session of 1855-56 (Cincinnati: 1855), 9.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994038, Henry County Marriages.
"George W. Shivel (1832-1893)," Find A Grave, Memorial 112941462 , accessed September 20, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/112941462.
